mapper.select: SELECT NAME, ID, PW, EMAIL FROM member;

SELECT FIRST.NAME, species.SPECIES_NAME, FIRST.AGE FROM (SELECT pet_information.PETNAME AS NAME, pet_information.SPECIES_ID AS SPE, pet_information.PETAGE AS AGE FROM pet_information INNER JOIN member ON pet_information.MEMBER_ID = member.MEMBER_ID AND pet_information.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}) AS FIRST INNER JOIN species ON FIRST.SPE = species.SPECIES_ID;
